name: Mean Klean™ Concrete Degreaser
description: Mean Klean™ Concrete Degreaser is a high-quality, heavy-duty degreaser and soil remover. The concentrated formula can be diluted with water to provide an economical, effective degreaser for many different surfaces. NewLook Concrete Degreaser removes grease, oil, transmission fluid, adhesive, and other greasy areas from concrete and masonry surfaces. When used according to directions, NewLook Concrete Degreaser effectively cleans concrete surfaces in preparation for staining with NewLook International Concrete Color Stains™ or other penetrating concrete color stains.
